title: Update predictions auto-refresh cadence to 30 minutes

requirements.summary: Change /predictions predictions-data polling to 30 minutes while keeping PremiumGate/TermsAcceptanceGate gating and live-score polling unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing /predictions, the predictions queries use a 30-minute refetch interval (1,800,000 ms) rather than 10,000 ms.
PremiumGate and TermsAcceptanceGate behavior on /predictions is unchanged (users without required access are still blocked appropriately).
Live score polling remains at its existing cadence and continues to update independently of predictions refresh.

file_operations.description: Add shared refetch interval constants (including PREDICTIONS_REFETCH_INTERVAL_MS = 1800000) so both list/detail pages can reference the same 30-minute cadence.

Update the React Query options passed to useGetAllPredictions and useGetPredictionsBySport to use the 30-minute predictions refetch interval constant (1,800,000 ms) instead of 10,000 ms, without altering PremiumGate/TermsAcceptanceGate wrappers or the useGetAllLiveScores polling behavior.

requirements.summary: Change /predictions/$id selected prediction polling to 30 minutes while keeping PremiumGate/TermsAcceptanceGate gating and live-score updates unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing /predictions/$id, the prediction query uses a 30-minute refetch interval (1,800,000 ms) rather than 10,000 ms.
The live score panel continues to update at its existing cadence and is not slowed down by the prediction refresh change.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Update the React Query options passed to useGetPrediction to use the shared 30-minute predictions refetch interval constant (1,800,000 ms) instead of 10,000 ms, without changing PremiumGate/TermsAcceptanceGate wrappers or the useGetAllLiveScores polling cadence used by the live score panel.
